d1e3.d: Charlie sings a song to Engineer Bob about his goals in life and the two become good friends.

d1e10.d: A new diesel train is brought to the railway company to replace Charlie.

d1e17.d: Engineer Bob protests Charlie being replaced. Charlie is sent away.

d1e24.d: Mr. Martin needs to get somewhere quick but no trains are available, except for Charlie. Mr. Martin gives Charlie a chance.

d1e31.d: Charlie gets Mr. Martin to his destination on time, and gets a new job.

d1e46.d: Engineer Bob and the steam train Charlie are the best team in the Mid-World Railway Company. Charlie reveals he is alive.

d1e53.d: Engineer Bob refuses to pilot the new trains . Charlie becomes very sad.

d1e60.d: Charlie speeds down the tracks, like old times.
